projects.title: MERN banking app & API
projects.subtitle: iO Full Stack Track project
projects.description: This is an in progress project as part of my course with iO Academy. Currently, I'm building a mock back-end banking API using Node and Express in a Controller/Service pattern, MongoDB, and a Jest test suite; next week I'll be using React, and other tools, to build the front end.

projects.title: Front-end todo app
projects.subtitle: personal project
projects.description: This is a personal project that I started in my spare time. Currently, itâ€™s written in Vanilla JS with Handlebars and fairly basic HTML and CSS. I hope to implement new tools, technologies and techniques as my knowledge grows.

projects.title: Typescript web application
projects.subtitle: iO Full Stack Track project
projects.description: This project was part of the course I took with iO Academy. We were tasked, as two separate, agile teams of 8, to add functionality to a legacy application written in Typescript. I worked on implementing Bootstrap modals throughout the app, adding functionality to the user journey experienced whilst completing the test (using Typescript), and some minor bug fixes.

projects.title: OOP PHP web application
projects.subtitle: iO Full Stack Track project
projects.description: This was another group project where I and my team (8 in total) were required to design an application from the ground up that adhered to SOLID principles. We designed a class structure/architecture as a team and worked to implement this using PHP with a minimal front-end, constructed with HTML5 and CSS (using SASS, with a Gulp compiler).

projects.title: Javascript API book collection
projects.subtitle: iO Full Stack Track project
projects.description: This is a totally front-end build that uses a simple api request to the Open Library API. It's put together using vanilla Javascript, Handlebars, HTML5, and CSS3.

projects.title: PHP MVC Slim application
projects.subtitle: iO Full Stack Track project
projects.description: This application was built as part of my iO Academy course. I used the Slim framework to structure this simple todo app, borrowing some styling ideas from my front-end todo app. The templates use a mix of HTML5 and CSS3 (compiled from SCSS using Gulp).
